text: Uukwiyu Constituency is an electoral constituency in the Oshana Region of Namibia. 11,894 people live in this region,Constituencies of Namibia, 2004 the capital is the settlement of Uukwiyu. == Politics == Uukwiyu constituency is dominated by the South West Africa People's Organization party, which have been Namibiaâ€™s dominant party since the Border War. In the 2010 regional elections, SWAPO politician Andreas N. Amundjindi won the constituency with 3,701 votes. The government opposition was Salmi Benjameni of the Rally for Democracy and Progress, who received only 48 votes. In the 2015 local and regional elections the SWAPO candidate won and became councillor after no opposition party nominated a candidate. == References == Category:Constituencies of Oshana Region
title: Uukwiyu Constituency
